creator: jeremias@apache.org
text:
Patrick Jaromin <patrick.at.jgsullivan.dot.com> posted a patch for custom font
support in Java2DRenderer:
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/xmlgraphics-fop-dev/200712.mbox/%3cAAD1044DDFFCC84895A899314A72FB6C01C06F4D@be04.exg3.exghost.com%3e

I'll attach it here for completeness.

creator: jeremias@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 21353
Custom font support for Java2DRenderer

ICLA was recorded on 2007-12-22. Patch applied with modifications as described
on the mailing list:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=609627&view=rev

Thanks a lot, Patrick! That's a useful feature.
creator: jeremias@apache.org
